document_name: Signed Prodoc- Institutional Strengthening and Capacity Building for the Promotion of Good Governance in Tobago.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/TTO/00035707/Signed Prodoc- Institutional Strengthening and Capacity Building for the Promotion of Good Governance in Tobago.pdf

outputs.output_descr:
The project's intended outcomes include:
1) Improved efficiency and equity in the delivery of public infrastructure and utility services through a mentorship programme that would allow for knowledge transfer between the recruited engineers and local staff of the Division of Public Utilities  (DIPU).
2) Promotion of the UN Volunteer ethic to encourage community service, outreach and committed actions for the public.

project_descr: Institutional Strengthening and Capacity-builidng for the Promotion of Good Governance in Tobago
project_title: Engineers to Infrastructure and Public Utilities-Tobago
